name: 💪Swole Squad🥊🐜🥗 -LD48 Edition
description:
*Controls* Click the chat window or the bottom bar containing choices for chat messages to send

*Content Warning* Blood, gore, expletives

Story, programming, and most of the images and audio were generated during a healthy weekend of 4/23-4/25/2021 by yours truly.

This game is locked in the state it was at 5:00PM of 4/25/2021, but updated versions can be played at http://hinasakazaki.com/ChatHorror/
